channel.title: Recruitment on Christopher Hicks
channel.description: Recent content in Recruitment on Christopher Hicks

item.title: Vocal Media is hiring for a Data Warehouse Engineer
item.description:
Is anyone in my network looking for work these days?

One of our family members works at Vocal Media. They’ve been very happy with their role, so I hope this Senior Software Engineer role could be worth your time to check out. It sounds focused on the data warehouse from the job description. So you don’t have to worry about me competing with you.

Feel free to comment on this post or DM me if you’re actively looking for something now.
